Approximating logistic coefficients

A simulation analysis

Developed by Gabriel Hoffman

Run on 2025-07-15 10:34:47.396961

Source: vignettes/beta_approx.Rmd
beta_approx.Rmd

Using the z-statistic to approximate the coefficient from logistic regression model is most accurate for large sample size, balanced class ratio (i.e. ϕ\phi near 0.5), and small β\beta.
